dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.description: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, make a purchase, or contact us. This may include:

items.personal: Personal information (name, email address, phone number)

dataUsage.title: How We Use Your Data
dataUsage.description: We use the information we collect to:

items.service: Provide, maintain, and improve our services
items.communication: Send you technical notices and customer support messages

dataSharing.title: Data Sharing
dataSharing.description: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent, except as described in this policy.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at contact@luccybyey.fr

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.description: By accessing and using this website, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement.

items.products: Access to our luxury fashion products

items.lawful: Use our services for lawful purposes only

intellectualProperty.description: All content on this website, including text, graphics, logos, and images, is the property of Luccy By E.Y and is protected by copyright and trademark laws.

limitation.title: Limitation of Liability
limitation.description: We shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages resulting from the use of our services.

modifications.title: Modifications
modifications.description: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting.

whatAreCookies.title: What are Cookies?
whatAreCookies.description: Cookies are small text files that are placed on your computer or mobile device when you visit our website. They help us provide you with a better experience.

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.description: These cookies are necessary for the website to function properly and cannot be disabled.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting and reporting information anonymously.

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.description: These cookies are used to deliver advertisements that are relevant to you and your interests.

updates.title: Updates to This Policy
updates.description: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page.

commitment.title: Our Commitment
commitment.description: Luccy By E.Y is committed to ensuring digital accessibility for people with disabilities. We are continually improving the user experience for everyone and applying the relevant accessibility standards.

guidelines.title: Conformance Standards
guidelines.description: This website strives to conform to WCAG 2.1 Level AA guidelines and other accessibility standards.

feedback.title: Feedback and Contact
feedback.description: We welcome your feedback on the accessibility of our website. If you encounter any accessibility barriers, please contact us:

limitations.title: Known Limitations
limitations.description: Despite our efforts, some parts of our website may not be fully accessible. We are working to address these issues.

improvements.title: Ongoing Improvements
improvements.description: We regularly review our website's accessibility and make improvements as part of our commitment to digital inclusion.
